card.name: Baron Zemo
card.property: Forced Interrupt: After Baron Zemo makes an undefended attack, place 1 threat on the main scheme.

card.name: Baron Zemo
card.property: Forced Interrupt: After Baron Zemo makes an undefended attack, place 2 threat on the main scheme.

card.name: Baron Zemo
card.property: Forced Interrupt: After Baron Zemo makes an undefended attack, stun the target of that attack.

card.name: Attack On Triskelion
card.property: Contents: Baron Zemo (I) and Baron Zemo (II). (Baron Zemo (II) and Baron Zemo (III) for expert mode.) Life Model Decoys environment. Standard encounter set. Legions of Hydra, Masters of Evil and Bomb Scare modular sets. Captain America Nemesis (Baron Zemo) set. Setup: Put the Life Model Decoys environment into play. Put the Bomb Scare side scheme into play. Put a Hydra Soldier minion into play engaged with each player. Shuffle the encounter deck. Advance to stage 1B.

alternate.name: Attack On Triskelion
alternate.property: Forced Response: After you change to your Alter-Ego form, place 1 threat on the main scheme.
The S.H.I.E.L.D. headquarters have been stormed by Baron Zemo and his horde of minions.

card.name: Operation Firestarter
card.property: When Revealed: Deal 2 damage to all exhausted friendly characters. Exhaust all friendly characters. Advance to stage 2B.
Triskelion has been set ablaze! As our heroes regroup Baron Zemo makes his way to the sub-basement...

alternate.name: Operation Firestarter
alternate.property: If this stage is completed, the players lose the game.
Baron Zemo has take control of S.H.I.E.L.D.'s hi-tech weapon arsenal. He must be stopped!
